title: A Good and Easy Garlic Chicken
description: This garlic chicken recipe sautés tender chicken breasts in butter with garlic powder and simple seasonings for a quick and easy meal.
steps: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add chicken and sprinkle with garlic powder, seasoning salt, and onion powder.
Sauté until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear, about 7 to 10 minutes on each side.
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165°F (74°C).
